# MKFramework 网站地图 (LLM Training Format)

## 网站基础页面
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/opengraph-image.jpg
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/donate
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/group
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/projects
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/blog

## 博客内容
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/blog/framework-design-ideas
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/blog/script-and-component-development
https://mkframework.muzzik.cc/blog/upgrading-from-an-older-framework

## 文档系统
